cards.title: London
cards.subtitle: Big Ben
cards.description: A beautiful city with rich history and culture.
cards.subDescription: Explore the iconic Big Ben, stroll along the River Thames, and visit world-class museums in the heart of London. Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture and diverse neighborhoods.

cards.title: Paris
cards.subtitle: Eiffel Tower
cards.description: The city of love and lights.
cards.subDescription: Admire the romantic allure of the Eiffel Tower, wander through charming streets, and indulge in exquisite French cuisine. Paris is a blend of romance, art, and history.

cards.title: New York
cards.subtitle: Statue of Liberty
cards.subDescription: Stand in awe of the Statue of Liberty, explore the bustling streets of Times Square, and experience the diversity of cultures in the city that never sleeps.

cards.title: Tokyo
cards.subtitle: Tokyo Tower
cards.description: A blend of traditional and modern culture.
cards.subDescription: Discover the harmony of traditional temples and futuristic technology. Tokyo offers a unique blend of ancient traditions and cutting-edge innovation.

cards.title: Rome
cards.subtitle: Colosseum
cards.subDescription: Step back in time at the Colosseum, wander through the Roman Forum, and savor the essence of ancient history in the heart of Rome.

cards.title: Cairo
cards.subtitle: Pyramids of Giza
cards.description: Discover the wonders of ancient Egypt.
cards.subDescription: Marvel at the grandeur of the Pyramids of Giza, explore the Sphinx, and delve into the mysteries of ancient Egyptian civilization in Cairo.

cards.title: Mumbai
cards.subtitle: Gateway of India
cards.description: Bollywood, street food, and vibrant culture.
cards.subDescription: Experience the glitz of Bollywood, savor the diverse street food, and soak in the vibrant culture around the iconic Gateway of India in Mumbai.

cards.title: Jerusalem
cards.subtitle: Western Wall
cards.description: A city of historical and religious significance.
cards.subDescription: Immerse yourself in the rich history and religious significance of Jerusalem. Visit the Western Wall and explore the ancient wonders of this sacred city.

cards.title: Kyoto
cards.subtitle: Kinkaku-ji
cards.description: Serene temples and traditional tea houses.
cards.subDescription: Find tranquility in the serene temples of Kyoto, stroll through traditional tea houses, and immerse yourself in the cultural richness of this Japanese city.

cards.title: Athens
cards.subtitle: Acropolis
cards.description: Birthplace of democracy and ancient wonders.
cards.subDescription: Explore the birthplace of democracy at the Acropolis, marvel at ancient wonders, and soak in the historical significance of Athens.

cards.title: Seoul
cards.subtitle: Gyeongbokgung Palace
cards.description: Modern metropolis with a rich cultural heritage.
cards.subDescription: Experience the fusion of modernity and cultural heritage at Gyeongbokgung Palace. Seoul offers a dynamic blend of tradition and contemporary lifestyle.

cards.title: Rio de Janeiro
cards.subtitle: Christ the Redeemer
cards.subDescription: Relax on the beautiful beaches, hike to the iconic Christ the Redeemer, and immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of Rio de Janeiro.

cards.title: Sydney
cards.subtitle: Sydney Opera House
cards.subDescription: Admire the architectural marvel of the Sydney Opera House,explore the vibrant harbor, and experience the cultural richness of Sydney.

cards.title: Cape Town
cards.subtitle: Table Mountain
cards.subDescription: Marvel at the breathtaking views from Table Mountain, explore the diverse cultures, and experience the beauty of Cape Town's landscapes.

cards.title: Prague
cards.subtitle: Charles Bridge
cards.subDescription: Stroll across the enchanting Charles Bridge, explore historic sites, and immerse yourself in the charming architecture of Prague.
